name: NBA Courtside 2 featuring Kobe Bryant
overview: Step onto the hardwood in the shoes of one of the most exciting and creative players in the NBA today. NBA Courtside 2 delivers unparalleled graphics, incredibly fluid player animations, an extremely wide range of one-player controls and all-new two-player controls. Create a rookie, and depending on how well you play, their skill ratings will increase or decrease. Quick Play, Season Play, Arcade Play, 3-Point Contest, Tournament Mode and four different Season modes.
